sql-collection
**************


Description
===========

The resource represents SQL collection for a specific database user in
a target. SqlCollection encapsulates the SQL commands issued in the
userâ€™s database sessions, and its execution context.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* generate-sql-firewall-policy

* get

* list

* purge-sql-collection-logs

* refresh-sql-collection-log-insights

* start

* stop

* update
